SEARCH
Package pt.uc.dei.controllers

Class AppraisalController

java.lang.Object
pt.uc.dei.controllers.AppraisalController
@Path("/appraisals") @Produces("application/json") @Consumes("application/json") public class AppraisalController extends Object
REST Controller for managing appraisal-related operations.

Provides endpoints for CRUD operations on appraisals, including creation, retrieval, updating, and filtering functionality.

    • updateAppraisal

      @PATCH public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response updateAppraisal(UpdateAppraisalDTO updateAppraisalDTO, @CookieParam("jwt") String jwtToken)
      Updates an existing appraisal.
      Parameters:
      updateAppraisalDTO - The appraisal update data
      Returns:
      Response with the updated appraisal DTO

    • getAppraisalById

      @GET @Path("/{id}") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response getAppraisalById(@PathParam("id") Long id)
      Retrieves an appraisal by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The appraisal ID
      Returns:

    • getAppraisalsWithFilters

      @GET public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response getAppraisalsWithFilters(@QueryParam("appraisedUserId") Long appraisedUserId, @QueryParam("appraisedUserName") String appraisedUserName, @QueryParam("appraisedUserEmail") String appraisedUserEmail, @QueryParam("appraisingUserId") Long appraisingUserId, @QueryParam("appraisingUserName") String appraisingUserName, @QueryParam("appraisingUserEmail") String appraisingUserEmail, @QueryParam("cycleId") Long cycleId, @QueryParam("state") String appraisalStateStr, @QueryParam("parameter") @DefaultValue("creationDate") String parameterStr, @QueryParam("order") @DefaultValue("DESCENDING") String orderStr, @QueryParam("limit") @DefaultValue("10") Integer limit, @QueryParam("offset") @DefaultValue("0") Integer offset, @CookieParam("jwt") String jwtToken)
      Retrieves appraisals with filtering options.
      Parameters:
      appraisedUserId - Optional filter by appraised user ID
      appraisingUserId - Optional filter by appraising user ID (manager)
      cycleId - Optional filter by cycle ID
      appraisalStateStr - Optional filter by appraisal state
      limit - Maximum number of results
      offset - Starting position for pagination
      Returns:
      Response with list of filtered appraisal DTOs

    • getAppraisalStats

    • closeAppraisalsByIds

      @POST @Path("/close-by-ids") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response closeAppraisalsByIds(@QueryParam("ids") String appraisalIds)
      Closes specific appraisals by their IDs. Only COMPLETED appraisals in OPEN cycles can be closed. Requires Admin authorization.
      Parameters:
      appraisalIds - Comma-separated list of appraisal IDs
      Returns:
      Response with count of closed appraisals

    • closeCompletedAppraisalsByCycle

      @POST @Path("/cycle/{cycleId}/close-completed") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response closeCompletedAppraisalsByCycle(@PathParam("cycleId") Long cycleId)
      Closes all COMPLETED appraisals in a specific cycle. Only works if the cycle is OPEN. Requires Admin authorization.
      Parameters:
      cycleId - The cycle ID
      Returns:
      Response with count of closed appraisals

    • closeCompletedAppraisalsByUser

      @POST @Path("/user/{userId}/close-completed") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response closeCompletedAppraisalsByUser(@PathParam("userId") Long userId)
      Closes all COMPLETED appraisals for a specific user. Only works for appraisals in OPEN cycles. Requires Admin authorization.
      Parameters:
      userId - The user ID
      Returns:
      Response with count of closed appraisals

    • closeAllCompletedAppraisals

      @POST @Path("/close-all-completed") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response closeAllCompletedAppraisals()
      Closes all COMPLETED appraisals in all OPEN cycles. Administrative bulk operation. Requires Admin authorization.
      Returns:
      Response with count of closed appraisals

    • exportAppraisalsPdf

      @GET @Path("/pdf") @Produces("application/pdf") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response exportAppraisalsPdf(@QueryParam("appraisedUserId") Long appraisedUserId, @QueryParam("appraisedUserName") String appraisedUserName, @QueryParam("appraisedUserEmail") String appraisedUserEmail, @QueryParam("appraisingUserId") Long appraisingUserId, @QueryParam("appraisingUserName") String appraisingUserName, @QueryParam("appraisingUserEmail") String appraisingUserEmail, @QueryParam("language") @DefaultValue("ENGLISH") String languageStr, @QueryParam("cycleId") Long cycleId, @QueryParam("state") String appraisalStateStr, @QueryParam("parameter") @DefaultValue("creationDate") String parameterStr, @QueryParam("order") @DefaultValue("DESCENDING") String orderStr)
      Exports filtered appraisals as a PDF file.
      Returns:
      PDF file with filtered appraisals
